text:
MASS SHOTTING

While #CapitolRiots / #Insurrection happening in DC, I was getting my #COVID19 #vaccine in the Bronx

If only decency, civility, & rationality were as easy to give in a shot

@moderna_tx / @pfizer please work on that

Epidemiologists, what's the Ro for stupidity? https://t.co/3cfVVcZoOh
